scripts.build: npm run init && npm run clean && node ../../bin/miaow.js
scripts.start: npm run init && npm run clean && node ../../bin/miaow.js -w
scripts.release: npm run init && npm run clean && node ../../bin/miaow.js -p && npm run release.mv
scripts.release.mv: rimraf ./release && npm run release.mv.html && npm run release.mv.ftl
